headline: Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon on AI’s Next Big Thing
summary: Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray about Qualcomm’s investments in the next big thing for AI: Edge AI. He also discusses Qualcomm’s expansion into industrial and automotive markets, and the biggest opportunities—and risks—heading into 2026.

content.title: Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon on AI’s Next Big Thing
content.description: Qualcomm CEO Cristiano Amon speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray about Qualcomm’s investments in the next big thing for AI: Edge AI. He also discusses Qualcomm’s expansion into industrial and automotive markets, and the biggest opportunities—and risks—heading into 2026.
